item.title: Math 309 A Spring 2021
item.description: General Information Office Hours: Mondays and Wednesdays after class (9:30-10:30), or by appointment Email: reedmeye@uw.edu Book: Linear Analysis by Boyce and Dipima (any edition) OR Elementary Differential Equations and Boundary Value Problems by Boyce and Diprima (any edition) Syllabus: syllabus Course Outline Week 1 Homework Due: Monday, April 5 at 11:00 PM Seattle time (on Gradescope). homework 1 Reading Read the “Preliminary Discourse” to Fourier’s The Analytical Theory of Heat (pages 1-13 of the book which corresponds to pages 24-36 in the pdf).
